article.title: React全家桶
article.body:
## 一、实用React组件
* Tooltip Component: [React tooltip component](https://github.com/wwayne/react-tooltip)

* ECharts Components: [Redefined chart library built with React and D3](https://github.com/recharts/recharts)

* Drag-Drop Component: [Beautiful, accessible drag and drop for lists with React.js](https://github.com/atlassian/react-beautiful-dnd)

* Modal Dialog Component: [Accessible modal dialog component for React](https://github.com/reactjs/react-modal)

* Waypoint Component: [A React component to execute a function whenever you scroll to an element](https://github.com/brigade/react-waypoint)

* DatePicker Component: [Flexible date picker for React](https://github.com/gpbl/react-day-picker)

* Bootstrap Component: [A collection of components for React, base on bootstrap 4.0](https://github.com/Lobos/react-ui)

* Sticky Component: [`<Sticky />` component for awesome React apps](https://github.com/captivationsoftware/react-sticky) 固定在头部的组件

* Tabs Component: [React tabs component](https://github.com/reactjs/react-tabs)

* Media Component: [A CSS media query component for React](https://github.com/ReactTraining/react-media)

* Email Editor Component: [Drag-n-Drop Email Editor Component for React.js](https://github.com/unroll-io/react-email-editor)

* Tappable Component: [Tappable component for React](https://github.com/JedWatson/react-tappable)

* Qrcode Component: [A `<QRCode/>` component for use with React](https://github.com/zpao/qrcode.react)

* Infinite Scroll Component:  [An infinite scroll component for React](https://github.com/guillaumervls/react-infinite-scroll)

* Flexbox Grid Component: [A set of React components implementing flexboxgrid with the power of CSS Modules](https://github.com/roylee0704/react-flexbox-grid)

* Dropzone Component: [Simple HTML5 drag-drop zone with React.js](https://github.com/react-dropzone/react-dropzone) 拖放上传

## 二、构建React项目工具
* [create-react-app](https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app): 适用于通用场景
* [Gatsby](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby): 适用于开发静态网站
* [Next.js](https://github.com/zeit/next.js): 适用于前后端同构方案
